action.text: SA 3320 fell when SA 3319 (the instructions of the motion to refer) fell.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 3320 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 3319 (the instructions of the motion to refer).
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3320 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 3319 (the instructions of the motion to refer).
